name: Sky with Missiles - Raise Hell in Sky
name_original: Sky with Missiles - Raise Hell in Sky
description:
**Disclaimer - Epilepsy Warning**

'Sky with Missiles' is a top-down action game set in sky. You have to DODGE the missiles and earn score.

Missiles spawn rate keeps increasing, so better luck if you are pro. Screen Shakes will make your life harder. Use your mouse to move. Click on the 'Plane' image in the title screen to start the game. You can post your high-scores in the comment section. That's All ! Have Fun :)

ScoreSpace GameJam #13
Music by Yumikari (Discord Name) https://www.ab-musician.com/music
Engine - Godot
Join the Discord Server :D

NOTE - Play the windows version if you encounter any error in HTML5 version. Also you can download the NO FLASHY SKY version if you don't want sky change color
